newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - AMISYS Managed Care.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - AMISYS Managed Care.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said its analysts Dirk Godsey and Stephen Fitzgibbons have raised their rating on the shares of AMISYS Managed Care Systems Inc to strong buy from buy.
-- AMISYS offers information management systems to payors and providers of managed health care.
-- The analysts noted AMISYS has exceed expectations in the first two quarters, and they expect the company will continue to show strong financial results in 1996's second half and into 1997.
-- They estimate the company will earn $0.13 a share in the third quarter and $0.16 a share in the fourth.
